Node.definition: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= place(s) where one's valuable goods are store

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a council or a group of older men who act with authority on behalf of or over their people; some represent an entire nation, others manage the affairs at the town level; some provide their leader with counsel; involved in both judicial and military decisions, and participating in cultic ceremonies; ≈ expected to be wise and considered worthy of deference and respect

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= area within a town, in most cases protected by its own wall
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range

= a council or a group of older men who act with authority on behalf of or over their people; some represent an entire nation, others manage the affairs at the town level; some provide their leader with counsel; involved in both judicial and military decisions, and participating in cultic ceremonies; ≈ expected to be wise and considered worthy of deference and respect

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to take up|to lift up|to carry
Node.definition: literally: to lift up; hence: = action by which humans take hold of objects with their hands, with the intention of holding them or bringing them to another location
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: Tent of Meeting; hence: = construction, also referred to as the Tabernacle (מִשְׁכָּן) or the Tent of the Testimony, ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► as the sanctuary where YHWH chose to meet with his people, before Solomon's temple was built

literally: Tent of Meeting; hence: = construction, also referred to as the Tabernacle (מִשְׁכָּן) or the Tent of the Testimony, ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► as the sanctuary where YHWH chose to meet with his people, before Solomon's temple was built

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth
= a large gathering of humans or creatures ► usually for a specific purpose

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which two or more parties come together in a certain place for a particular purpose

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action with which one determines or estimates the number of a collection of persons or objects
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= innermost room at the back of the main temple building; ► location of the ark of the covenant; ≈ regarded as the most holy place

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
literally: the holiest of holies; hence: = innermost room at the back of the main temple building; ► location of the ark of the covenant; ≈ regarded as the most holy place
literally: the holiest of holies; hence: = innermost room at the back of the main temple building; ► location of the ark of the covenant; ≈ regarded as the most holy place
= part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection
= heavenly creature with wings, ► carrying the throne of God, symbol of God's majesty, and associated with his presence
= heavenly creature with wings, ► carrying the throne of God, symbol of God's majesty, and associated with his presence
= action by which humans or animals spread out part of their body
= part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= state or process by which a surface is covered by another object, ► often making this surface more or less invisible
= heavenly creature with wings, ► carrying the throne of God, symbol of God's majesty, and associated with his presence

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= long, slender piece of wood; ◄ made from a straight branch or tree; ► used for carrying objects or for locking gates from the inside
= to be long or to increase in length
= long, slender piece of wood; ◄ made from a straight branch or tree; ► used for carrying objects or for locking gates from the inside

Node.gloss: to be seen|to become visible|to appear
Node.definition: = process by which humans, deities, or objects become perceptible, primarily though not necessarily exclusively to the eye
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
= long, slender piece of wood; ◄ made from a straight branch or tree; ► used for carrying objects or for locking gates from the inside

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= innermost room at the back of the main temple building; ► location of the ark of the covenant; ≈ regarded as the most holy place

Node.gloss: to be seen|to become visible|to appear
Node.definition: = process by which humans, deities, or objects become perceptible, primarily though not necessarily exclusively to the eye
= referent to the location outside of an object
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= small, flat tablet, ◄ made of stone, ► on which words were scratched with a stylus; ≈ associated with conditions that are permanent and are not likely to change
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

= a mountain, also known as the mountain of God; ◄ it is located on the Sinai (סִינַי) peninsula, ► and known as the place where God appeared to Moses (מֹשֶׁה) and where later the law was given to Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) on their way to the promised land
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to make a covenant|to make a treaty
Node.definition: literally: to cut (a covenant); hence: = action by which two or more parties make a solemn agreement, accompanied by stipulations, blessings, and curses
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= the tabernacle or temple of YHWH, described in terms of its holiness
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
literally: to be found (in a place); hence: = state in which humans or objects are located in a certain place
= action by which humans perform the rituals that allow them to be in the presence of a deity

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.
= a group of people within a larger group, placed together for a particular task or duty
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= man; ◄ son of Berechiah (בֶּרֶכְיָהוּ) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► temple singer; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ son of Joel (יֹואֵל) ► temple singer; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite responsible for temple music and praise in the time of David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= state in which humans wear certain clothes, often for a specific purpose

= high quality woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of cloth and clothes; worn by the rich and by priests and Levites; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a soundbox made of wood with strings of animal intestines stretched over the top, parallel to the soundbox

= musical instrument consisting of a sound box ◄ made of wood, out of the ends or sides of which projected two arms; the arms supported a crosspiece; strings descended from the crosspiece over the sound box and the number of strings could vary; ► often used to accompany singing
literally: the rising (of the sun): = a cardinal direction indicating the direction of the rising sun
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= to play the trumpet (חֲצֹוצְרָה)
= tubular or conical wind instrument with flared mouth and bright penetrating ringing tone; ◄ made out of metal; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

= state in which a countable entity is one in number|= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved|= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to lift up (one's) voice; hence: = action by which humans speak more loudly than usual
= tubular or conical wind instrument with flared mouth and bright penetrating ringing tone; ◄ made out of metal; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left
= a visible collection of condensed water vapor hanging in the atmosphere, often high above the ground ≈ also used to represent God's presence and activity

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= a visible collection of condensed water vapor hanging in the atmosphere, often high above the ground ≈ also used to represent God's presence and activity
= action by which objects enter a certain location or container, or cover a certain surface to the extent that little or no space is left
= a manifestation of God, sometimes visible, either in a cloud, or looking like fire, capable of speech
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
